title: Accidental RP purchase
body: I accidentally purchased RP on my main account. I am happy to refund with my token but i cant seem to refund it(Doesnt have a button) I was looking for some help as i dont even have the RP in my account but it still says that i have purchased it. Server: Oceania. Account: Thealmightytacocat. Any help would be appreciated :D

replies.body: It looks like you had gifted that RP instead of outright buying it, but since this is a billing related issue I've gone ahead and created a ticket and sent it over to our billing agents! You should be hearing from them soon ^_^
